attributes.action: Banks - The Goverment to sack the top management and their Boards. The Goverment to restructure and regulate the banks in the future.   r
attributes.additional_details:
The Banks have brought this country to its knees by their irresponcible and criminal behavior. The debts they created, we the population are paying for as tax payers.Now we all must suffer the Austerity Measures that are imposed upon us.This all came about by the greed of  the bankers.

The Goverment must clear out all the Top Staff and Boards of the banking companies.Make the Boards and Top management pay back their bonuses, past and present, and a high percentage of their salaries.

The goverment to appoint new staff and board members.

The Goverment to appoint an independent body to regulate the banking industry in the future.
